did.abstract: One scrapbook compiled by Dr. Henry F. Minton of Brooklyn. The scrapbook contains items relating to the prominent Brooklyn clergyman Henry Ward Beecher and his congregation, Plymouth Church. Materials span the period 1847 to 1887 and include newspaper clippings and cartoons, programs, pamphlets, tickets for events, engravings, and sermons by and about Beecher.
